item.title: À propos de nous / About Us
item.description:
• Bavarder avec nous: installer l’appli Telegram puis devenir membre de notre groupe.
    Chat with us: install the Telegram app then join our group.
  • Pour rejoindre notre liste de diffusion, envoyez un e-mail vierge à parlonslondon+subscribe@groups.io
    To join our mailing list send a blank email to parlonslondon+subscribe@groups.io
  • Rejoignez-nous à notre groupe de Meetup. Join us on our Meetup group.

item.title: Notes de réunion / Meeting Notes
item.description: 17 personnes ont assisté. Du vocabulaire interessante le carnet de notes report card navetteur/euse commuter animal sounds dog: ouaf; cat: miaou un cabinet médical doctor’s office une dystopie dystopia sans concession “dark” (as in film or TV) coup de soleil sun burn coup de chaleur heat-stroke Des Autres Choses Personnage principal dans LUPIN (tres bonne serie francaise sur Netflix): Omay Sy N’oubliez pas Bryan Cranston!

item.title: Duolingo Update for French Learners
item.description: You may have noticed that our meeting is no longer listed on Duolingo. The meeting is still on, and everyone is welcome to join!

item.title: Resources
item.description: We don’t teach French - we are deliberately a casual group just for conversation, there are no formal lessons and no homework or preparation is required. However here are some helpful links that our members recommend: Learning Duolingo - a website and smartphone app that teachs French and many other languages gradually, for free (or without ads for an annual fee) Memrise - a paid smartphone app that helps learn vocabulary Rosetta Stone - paid software with some similarities to Duolingo Free French course from TV5MONDE Dictionaries WordReference - free-to-use (apps also available) Linguee - free-to-use (apps also available) Immersion: Watching and Listening Radio-Canada podcasts - practice listening or just immerse yourself in the sounds 239 French Conversations on YouTube Language Learning with Netflix - an extension for the Chrome browser - if you have a Netflix subscription, it can show subtitles in your native language and another at the same time News in French Canada ICI Radio-Canada - Canada’s public broadcasting La Presse - independent, non-profit Québec news organisation World Courrier International - French language news from a variety of sources africanews - Pan-African news network Euronews - Pan-European news network France 24 - 24-hour international news TV station with a live feed, owned by the French Government (also available on YouTube) Radio France Internationale - French world public radio service Online Conversation Groups This group on Meetup Other French groups on Meetup - within 100km of London Duolingo Events has a lot of meetings, including in French Local Information and Learning Vivre en Français à London - list of French resources from the City of London, Ontario L’Action - London, Ontario area news in French Collège Boréal - offers French-as-a-Second-Language courses at their downtown campus in Citi Plaza Western Continuing Studies - offers French classes at their downtown Citi Plaza location Thames Valley District School Board - offer Core French and French Immersion programs for schoolkids The London, Ontario article on French-language Wikipedia
